person.persName: Benjamin B. Allphin (Boone County, Kentucky, farmer.)

body.p: Boone County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Catharine Allphin. Father of Margaret Allphin, Mary F. Allphin, Sarah E. Allphin, James J. Allphin, Albert L. Allphin, and Nora F. Allphin. Farmer in Boone County, Kentucky in 1850. Farmer in Boone County in 1860. Employed David Perry as mason and W. Middlesworth as carpenter in Boone County in 1860. Owned three enslaved persons in Boone County in 1860.
